title: @Meddler About the Nidalee buff on PBE.
body: Can you guys give some clarity on what this buff will accomplish? I know that it will assist her jungle clear but I can't help but feel that lane Nidalee might make a comeback. I really enjoyed using Nidalee in the Jungle but it is proven that her kit is way too difficult to balance around the jg. If she is strong she is too strong and now she is extremely weak. I'm sure many other players would agree on lane Nidalee being best. I would love to hear how the balance team feels about this.

replies.body:
We'd originally been planning on buffing Nid in patch 7.1. We came to the conclusion a couple of days ago though that it wasn't appropriate to wait that long after watching her performance in 6.23. Since we were right at the end of the patch development cycle we didn't have time to do anything but a very simple buff. A base AD increase seemed like a good approach as a result, given it's fairly predictable and adds power to Nid regardless of build or position (something we do want to do).

I think it's pretty likely we also look at Nid in 7.1 anyway. We do think it's likely her performance will improve a bit as players optimize her more for the new jungle (she's got more jungling nuances than most). She might still be too weak even with this base stat buff though.
